subject: Retour haptic
description_text:
Bonjour sont ils vendu avec une prise européenne ?

Envoyé à partir de Outlook pour iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi Anthony Baudelot,  We offer four types of plugs: EU, UK, AU, and US standards. By default, we will select the appropriate plug type based on the shipping address and country provided with your order. If you need a specific type, you can also leave a note on your order specifying the required plug.
